Mr. Fishman dreamed of exploring space his whole life. One day, he was finally sent on a mission to clean the satellites in Earth`s orbit.
Once he got into space, Mr. Fishman realized how boring his mission was, so he stole the spaceship to go on a real adventure. He wasn`t an experienced pilot, though.
Suddenly, he saw that he was on a crash course with the Sun! His only choice was to make an emergency landing on the nearby planet Mercury.
In spite of his close call, Mr. Fishman had no desire to head back to Earth. Now, with the infinite universe at his fingertips, the true journey begins...
